Question: Before becoming an astronaut, this person was an officer in the U.S Navy and served in the Korean War.
Hints: In May 2005, this person became involved in an unusual legal battle with his barber of 20 years, Marx Sizemore.
This person attended Blume High School and took flying lessons at the county airport.
This person's astronaut application arrived about a week past the June 1, 1962, deadline.
